LanguageData.AK_AbsoluteDamageMultiplier.label: 真实伤害
LanguageData.AK_AbsoluteDamageMultiplier.description: A multiplier on damage from Absolute-type attacks for weapons made of this material.
LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Absolute.label: 护甲 - 真实
LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Absolute.description: 真实伤害极为罕见,仅极少干员的技能可以造成. 没有任何护甲可以抵御此类型伤害.
LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Absolute.labelForFullStat: 护甲 - 真实(装甲属性)
LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Magic.label: 护甲 - 法术
LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Magic.description: 对于法术类型伤害的抗性,法术伤害通常来自于术士和辅助干员. 计算方式和原版一致.
LanguageData.AK_ArmorRating_Magic.labelForFullStatLis: 护甲 - 法术(装甲属性)
LanguageData.AK_MagicDamageMultiplier.label: 法术伤害
LanguageData.AK_MagicDamageMultiplier.description: A multiplier on damage from Magic-type attacks for weapons made of this material.
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Absolute.label: 护甲 - 真实
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Absolute.description: Armor against sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, and animal bites.
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Absolute.labelForFul: 护甲 - 真实(材料倍率)
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Magic.label: 护甲 - 法术
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Magic.description: Armor against sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, and animal bites.
LanguageData.AK_StuffPower_Armor_Magic.labelForFullSt: 护甲 - 法术(材料倍率)
